ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 78
ygData.msgSnippet: incidently, any bard can go down there too and speak with them. one of the bard songs will boost faction enough so that they view amiably. i wandered around
ygData.messageBody:
incidently, any bard can go down there too and speak with them. one of the
bard songs will boost faction enough so that they view amiably. i wandered
around for a while, but didn't find anything useful myself. all i found
was the vendor who sells the tinkered bag, which he would sell to me for
5700pp.

----

From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
Subject: Re: Solusek

Well, I have a gnome rogue (level 25) who I just brought there last
night... I'm going to see if I can sneak my way down to the gnomes. If
not
I will try to get a group that is heading that way... Problem with
soloing
there is that the gobs run when low on hps and go get help.. Can start
really vicious trains there.
